code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{numberWithCommas}from'../utils/formats';import'../App.css';import{GlobalContext}from'../context/GlobalState';var Balance=function Balance(){var _useContext=useContext(GlobalContext),transactions=_useContext.transactions,firstName=_useContext.firstName;var amounts=transactions.map(function(transaction){return transaction.amount;});var total=amounts.reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+=item;},0).toFixed(2);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",null,"Hi ",firstName,", Your Account Balance"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h1",{id:"balance"},"$",numberWithCommas(total)));};export default Balance;
